3 namespace Ubiquity\annotations;
4 
5 use Ubiquity\contents\validation\ValidatorsManager;
6 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UArray;
7 
22 class ValidatorAnnotation extends BaseAnnotation {
23  public $type;
24  public $message;
25  public $severity;
26  public $group;
27  public $constraints = [ ];
28 
32  public function initAnnotation(array $properties) {
33  if (isset ( $properties [0] )) {
34  $this->type = $properties [0];
35  unset ( $properties [0] );
36  if (isset ( $properties [1] )) {
37  if (! is_array ( $properties [1] )) {
38  $this->constraints = [ "ref" => $properties [1] ];
39  } else {
40  $this->constraints = $properties [1];
41  }
42  unset ( $properties [1] );
43  }
44  } else {
45  throw new \Exception ( 'Validator annotation must have a type' );
46  }
47  parent::initAnnotation ( $properties );
48  if (! isset ( ValidatorsManager::$validatorTypes [$this->type] )) {
49  throw new \Exception ( 'This type of annotation does not exists : ' . $this->type );
50  }
51  }
52 
53  public static function initializeFromModel($type, $ref = null, $constraints = []) {
54  $validator = new ValidatorAnnotation ();
55  if (! is_array ( $constraints )) {
56  $constraints = [ ];
57  }
58  if (isset ( $ref )) {
59  $constraints ["ref"] = $ref;
60  }
61  $validator->type = $type;
62  $validator->constraints = $constraints;
63  return $validator;
64  }
65 
66  protected function asAnnotation() {
67  $fields = $this->getPropertiesAndValues ();
68  $result = [ ];
69  $result [] = $fields ["type"];
70  unset ( $fields ["type"] );
71  if (isset ( $fields ["constraints"] ) && isset ( $fields ["constraints"] ["ref"] )) {
72  $result [] = $fields ["constraints"] ["ref"];
73  unset ( $fields ["constraints"] ["ref"] );
74  }
75  if (sizeof ( $fields ) > 0) {
76  foreach ( $fields as $field => $value ) {
77  if ((is_array ( $value ) && sizeof ( $value ) > 0) || ! is_array ( $value )) {
78  $result [$field] = $value;
79  }
80  }
81  }
82  return UArray::asPhpArray ( $result );
83  }
84 }
